顠字的基本解释

顠
piǎo
散乱的（一说斑白的）：“须发薴顇兮顠鬓白。”

顠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［piǎo］
［《廣韻》敷沼切，上小，滂。］
［《廣韻》符少切，上小，並。］
头发斑白。

顠字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　顠； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1409第07
【廣韻】符少切【集韻】婢小切，?音摽。【玉篇】髮白貌。　又【集韻】匹妙切，音剽。義同。　又紕招切，音漂。顠顠，髮亂貌。與?同。【楚辭·九思】含憂强老兮愁不樂，鬚髮薴顇兮顠鬢白。【註】顠，疋招切，髮亂貌。　又匹沼切，音縹。義同。

顠字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
顠字的起名意思

暂无。

顠
Basic explanation of words
顠
piǎo
Scattered (for instance, white ones): "Beards, hairs, hairs, and temples are white."
顠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［piǎo］
["Guangyun" is applied to the marsh and cuts, the upper small, the peng. ]
["Guangyun" Fu Shaoqie, Shangxiao, and. ]
Grey hair.
顠
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　顠; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1409 Page 07
[Guang Yun] Fu Shaoqie [Ji Yun] Maid Xiaoqie, "Yin". 【Jade articles】White appearance.　[Jiyun] The horse is wonderfully cut, the sound is plucked. The same meaning.　 纰 cuts again, the sound drifts.顠顠, messy appearance. Same as? [Songs of the Chu·Nine Thoughts] Anxious, strong, old, sad and unhappy, with beards and hairs, and white at the temples. [Note] 顠, 疋 move to cut, messy appearance.　Pipe and marsh cut again, sound lingering. The same meaning.

顠
Name meaning
Nothing.
piǎo
(1) 头发斑白 greying
(2) 发乱 dishevelled
